Naixu Guo

I am a researcher in quantum computing and machine learning, currently working on quantum algorithms for optimization and machine learning tasks.

Recent News

[08/2025] Our paper Design nearly optimal quantum algorithm for linear differential equations via Lindbladians has been accepted by Physical Review Letters.

[08/2025] I started my visit to Xanadu, University of Toronto, and University of Waterloo.

[08/2025] I have received the research excellence scholarship from Sandbox AQ.

[08/2025] Our paper Quantum linear algebra is all you need for Transformer architectures has been presented as a plenary talk at AQIS 2025 by Patrick.

[06/2025] Our paper Design nearly optimal quantum algorithm for linear differential equations via Lindbladians has been accepted for a talk at AQIS 2025.
